DOC.brief_summary: This US population-based study explore incidence risk fracture among adult without human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection . The objective determine incidence fracture among person without HIV infection , compare risk factor fracture among person without HIV infection , examine association antiretroviral ( ARV ) treatment exposure incidence risk fracture among person HIV infection .
DOC.brief_title: Fractures Stratified HIV Antiretroviral Therapy ( ART ) Status
DOC.detailed_description: This study use data Integrated Health Care Information Services ( IHCIS ) National Managed Care Benchmarked Database , health insurance claim database . The study two analytic component . The first retrospective cohort study compare subject without HIV infection subject HIV infection incidence risk fracture , include use anyARV drug person HIV infection . The second nested case-control study limit person HIV infectiion within cohort . Cases incident fracture occur diagnosis HIV infection , control without fracture . Cases control compare risk factor incident fracture include ARV drug exposure . The drug exposure include individual nucleoside reverse transcriptase inhibitor ( NRTIs ) ( permitted sample size ) ARV drug class . ViiV Healthcare new sponsor study , GlaxoSmithKline process update system reflect change sponsorship .
DOC.criteria: The inclusion criterion continuous enrollment least 12 month Integrated Health Care Information Services ( IHCIS ) National Managed Care Benchmarked Database interval January 1 , 1997 March 31 , 2008 , age 18 year age old , continuous eligibility pharmacy benefit IHCIS enrollment . Exclusion criterion membership Integrated Health Care Information Services ( IHCIS ) National Managed Care Benchmarked Database without valid gender age record , less 12 month continuous enrolment , member residence 'national ' census region . This latter grouping represent member either live continental US mask confidentiality reason base IHCIS archive data per Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act .
